Title: The Difference Between Good and Bad Success with The Minimalists
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Joshua Fields Millburn and Ryan Nicodemus—aka The Minimalists. They’re Emmy-nominated Netflix stars and New York Times bestselling authors who help people live more meaningful lives with less. With a team of over 20 people, they’re able to reach millions through their website, books, podcast and films. In this episode, Joshua and Ryan explain the difference between good and bad success, how to run a minimalist business, and how to be a well-rounded, healthy leader.

 

You’ll learn:

•      How what you wear can simplify your day

•      The mindset of successful business leaders

•      Why success doesn’t exist

•      How your life might be better with less
